caption.p: Pharayngocutaneous fistula defect and IMAP flap raised on left 2nd intercostal perforator. Clinical photographs demonstrating (A) circumferential full thickness pharyngeal defect post scar and stricture release, followed by (B) left sided IMAP flap raised and islanded on a second intercostal perforator (Î”) which is shown with further magnification in (C).
